transArray.content: The main reason is that the air conditioner is too noisy and there is no air conditioner in the lobby corridor. The room is a bit small. When I renewed my room after staying for three days, the price increased by 30%. The experience was very bad. I just changed to another hotel.

Dear guest, the hotel has given positive feedback on the situation you reported, and the store has conducted self-examination and rectification. We will take your questions very seriously and look forward to your next visit.
